title: Looking for High silver + players for clash
body:
{{summoner:30}} 

Hey guys,

Looking for 3 people for clash tomorrow night. We have a top laner and pretty open for any other roles. If you don't mind a bit of shit talking and playing for sheep stations. Either reply on here for add me on my account 

Remove Kebabs

See ya

replies.body:
IGN : Spellhowler
Main Support but experienced in any role
 Silver  1 
Best champions being Braum, Tahm Kench and Janna but also have experience with plenty other supports

add me <3

If you would like a S3 on your team add me
ign: snipr pro bro
